description: Orpheus Black walks you through how to repurpose everyday items into kinky play toys, as well as how to modify every day items into fun cost effective SM instruments that you will love. You'll learn where to buy great makeshift toys but how to select the best pervertables for your money, including what potential pervertable items to avoid. Discover how to do fast, simple bondage with everyday items and use homemade paddles and other spanking implements, canes, and DIY restraints. None of these items require any special tools and can be made in minutes.
title: Pervertables: Converting Everyday Things into Kinky Toys
